nodes.text: Hagark was a male Felucian who lived during the early months of the Galactic Empire.

Hagark lived on the planet Felucia, but was captured by the Imperial Captain Vischera and taken to an Imperial prison. Vischera changed Hagark's gentic code, making the Felucian larger, more violent and fully obedient to the Captain. Vischera oversaw the combat training of Hagark and Kargrek, another similarly altered Felucian, eventually making them his personal bodyguards. When Vischera attacked a group of Alderaanian Resistance agents that had infiltrated the prison, Hagark and Kargrek accompanied him.
